description:
A beautiful 2-floor home in Harlem. New, full renovation in small residential building.   Huge garden.  Access to garden from both floors.  Big rooms. Big closets.  Master bath has an awesome Jacuzzi bath tub!  Beautiful hard wood floors.  We have   In a great shopping and touring neighborhood, lots of new bars, restaurants and cafes- close to the subway. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and groups.

You’ll love our place because of the big kitchen, the 2 bathrooms, the gym and yoga room, the coziness, the high ceilings, the garden views, and the location.

You'll be able to use the entire huge house - both up and downstairs.  We have a security system so you feel extra safe.

We would love to offer guidance and even get a bite to eat together - if that is what our guest would like.  We know NYC in and out and love to share our special knowledge!

Old middle class residential neighborhood. People know their neighbor's name. Our place is close to Apollo Theater, Sylvia's Restaurant, AMC Magic Johnson Harlem 9, Amy Ruth's, Central Park.

5 minutes walking from the lines 2 and 3 on 125th.  Buses and taxis within 3-5 minutes.
name: Huge, Renovated Apartment in NYC!
review: We stayed in the apartment as 6 and had a awesome time in NYC. Ari even gave us some tips for things to do in New York, which was very nice. The bed in the basement is a little bit small for 2 people, but perfectly fine for good friends or couples.
